verses.verse: It happened after<WH310> many<WH7227> days,<WH3117> when Yahweh<WH3068> had given rest<WH5117> to Israel<WH3478> from their enemies<WH341> all around,<WH5439> and Joshua<WH3091> was old<WH2204> and well advanced<WH935> in years,<WH3117>

that Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for all Israel,<WH3478> for their elders<WH2205> and for their heads,<WH7218> and for their judges<WH8199> and for their officers,<WH7860> and said<WH559> to them,<WH2204> "I am old and well advanced<WH935> in years.<WH3117>

You have seen<WH7200> all that Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> has done<WH6213> to all these nations<WH1471> because<WH6440> of you;<WH3068> for it is Yahweh your God<WH430> who has fought for you.<WH3898>

Behold,<WH7200> I have allotted<WH5307> to you these nations<WH1471> that remain,<WH7604> to be an inheritance<WH5159> for your tribes,<WH7626> from the Jordan,<WH3383> with all the nations<WH1471> that I have cut off,<WH3772> even to the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> toward the going down of the sun.<WH3996>

Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> will thrust<WH1920> them out from before<WH6440> you,<WH3423> and drive them from out of your sight.<WH6440> You shall possess<WH3423> their land,<WH776> as Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> spoke to you.<WH1696>

"Therefore be very<WH3966> courageous<WH2388> to keep<WH8104> and to do<WH6213> all that is written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> of Moses,<WH4872> that you not turn<WH5493> aside from it to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left;<WH8040>

that you not come<WH935> among these nations,<WH1471> these that remain<WH7604> among you;<WH2142> neither make mention of the name<WH8034> of their gods,<WH430> nor cause to swear<WH7650> by them,<WH5647> neither serve them,<WH7812> nor bow down yourselves to them;
but hold<WH1692> fast to Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> as you have done<WH6213> to this day.<WH3117>

"For Yahweh<WH3068> has driven great<WH1419> and strong<WH6099> nations<WH1471> out<WH3423> from before<WH6440> you.<WH376> But as for you, no man has stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> you to this day.<WH3117>
One<WH259> man<WH376> of you shall chase<WH7291> a thousand;<WH505> for it is Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> who fights<WH3898> for you,<WH1696> as he spoke to you.
Take good<WH3966> heed<WH8104> therefore to yourselves,<WH5315> that you love<WH157> Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

"But if you do at all<WH7725> go back,<WH7725> and hold<WH1692> fast to the remnant<WH3499> of these nations,<WH1471> even these who remain<WH7604> among you,<WH2859> and make marriages with them,<WH935> and go in to them, and they to you;

know<WH3045> for a certainty<WH3045> that Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> will no longer<WH3254> drive these nations<WH1471> from out<WH3423> of your sight;<WH6440> but they shall be a snare<WH6341> and a trap<WH4170> to you,<WH7850> a scourge in your sides,<WH6654> and thorns<WH6796> in your eyes,<WH5869> until you perish<WH6> from off this good<WH2896> land<WH127> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given you.<WH5414>

"Behold,<WH3117> today I am going<WH1980> the way<WH1870> of all the earth.<WH776> You know<WH3045> in all your hearts<WH3824> and in all your souls<WH5315> that not one<WH259> thing<WH1697> has failed<WH5307> of all the good<WH2896> things<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> concerning you.<WH935> All have happened to you.<WH259> Not one thing<WH1697> has failed of it.<WH5307>

It shall happen that as all the good<WH2896> things<WH1697> have come<WH935> on you of which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> to you,<WH3068> so Yahweh will bring<WH935> on you all the evil<WH7451> things,<WH1697> until he has destroyed<WH8045> you from off this good<WH2896> land<WH127> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given you,<WH5414>

when you disobey<WH5674> the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> which he commanded<WH6680> you,<WH1980> and go and serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and bow<WH7812> down yourselves to them.<WH639> Then the anger of Yahweh<WH3068> will be kindled<WH2734> against you,<WH6> and you will perish quickly<WH4120> from off the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which he has given to you.<WH5414>"
